title: Auslang = Australian supply language
brief_description: About creating order from confusion and adapting a more disciplined approach to inventory identification in industry. Standard names are vital and AUSLANG (Australian Supply Language) offers a comprehensive dictionary together with colloquial cross references thus reducing the incidence of duplication of stock. AUSLANG was derived from the NATO codification system for Australian Industry use
